page.title: 08Talke Youth Club
page.content: The youth club is run by two adults, Chris and Gaz.We have our meetings on Mondays and Thursdays from 6 30pm to 10 30pm in a wooden building by Hill Top school.To join you have to be ten years old and you have to leave when you are about twenty.The club closes during the school holidays.As I am only eleven I usually leave at about nine o'clock and walk home with my friends.At the youth club there is music,either tapes or records, and some people take their own.There is a snooker table and a pool table to play on, and there are two table tennis tables.Some people sit and play cards with their friends.Chris sells crisps, sweets,pop,coffee and tea at a counter. Sometimes there are special trips by coach to places like Alton Towers or Blackpool.It costs 20p to join and 10p for each meeting.
